content: Hey Peter Schroeder 🚀, thanks for checking out the article! Sure, that’s a great question! To be fully transparent, we don’t really have a streamlined task management workflow yet. We have been picking tools that we as individuals feel most comfortable with. Also, Trello has been working well for the blog editorial as a Kanban board while Asana feels more suitable for events planning as the task management aspect has more features. So we end up using a few tools for different purposes. I think it’d be great to streamline it a little. If you have any suggestions, it’d be great to hear from you. -Alfred
